products.title: Bella Blackout Sloe Purple Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Bella blackout sloe purple electric roller blind in purple. Made to measure from 138.17 with free uk mainland delivery. This electric roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and inside your home! 
 
This soft sloe purple electric roller blind is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure electric roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. Their electric rollers are great for privacy and light control, and due to their chain-free design, are inherently child-safe! 
 
At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the yorkshire textile industry, but their own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This purple electric roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by their blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.
 
 Product id: db-erbx2062 fabric colour: sloe purple material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: electric control battery powered energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes

products.title: Bella Blackout Orchid Purple Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Bella blackout orchid purple electric roller blind in purple. Made to measure from 140.59 with free uk mainland delivery. This electric roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style both inside and outside your home. 
 
 This orchid pink/purple electric roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, making this quality made to measure electirc roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. The lush purple hue of this fabric will look stunning when paired with natural and darker wooden tones and will beautifully compliment cool, contemporary shades. Their electric rollers are inherently child safe as they require no cords to operate & electric roller blinds are perfect for more dificult to reach windows as they can be operated with a remote control. They also introduce an exceptionally modern feel within the space.
